alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 08 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CENTRAL COLORADO RIVER BASIN AND GORE AND ELK MOUNTAINS/CENTRAL MOUNTAIN VALLEYS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 259 PM MST, a snow squall was over Avon, or 41 miles east of Glenwood Springs moving east at 20 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Avon, Vail, and Minturn around 305 PM MST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 155 and 184. Colorado 131 between mile markers 1 and 2. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
